text: The Gran Premio Latinoamericano also named Gran Premio Asociación Latinoamericana de Jockey Clubes e Hipódromos is a horse-race for thoroughbreds of the South American hypodromes. This is the main competition of the OSAF - South American Organization for the Promotion of the Thoruoughbred. At present, OSAF is made up of the most important South American Jockey Clubs, Horseracing Institutions, Breeders’ Associations, and Stud Books. Panama in 2009 and Mexico in 2011 was admitted to the Asociación Latinoamericana de Jockey Clubes e Hipódromos and their hypodromes can feature these races in the next years. This race is for 3 years old or more thoroughbreds. The distance is 2000 metres, but in 2012 is 2100 metres. Winners of all the years In the year of 2012 the race will be on 10 March at Hipódromo de Palermo, Buenos Aires. ==Winners== Year Host Track Winner Sire/Dam Jockey Trainer Owner Distance Track Time 2019 Club Hípico 2018 Maroñas Roman Rosso Roman Ruler Rose City Wilson Moreyra Jorge Mayansky Neer Stud La Primavera 2000m (1 1/4 mi; 10f) Dirt 2:02.05 2017 Valparaiso Sporting Sixties Song Sixties Icon Blissful Song Juan C.
